src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (četvrtak): Partizan može do pogotka na Old Trafordu, "ziceri" za AZ Alkmar i Vulverhempton
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 7. novembar...

07 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.

Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?


Ostavite svoj komentar ispod teksta...

Fiksevi dana
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499085
16:50 | Astana - AZ Alkmar
Gostovanje u Nur-Sultanu AZ-u dolazi u savršenom trenutku jer Astana nema nikakve šanse da prođe grupu i fokusirala se na odbranu titule u Kazahstanu. To je bio ispravan potez, međutim, igrači su joj "izduvani" i to dvojku čini sigurnom, a nije isključeno da dođe iz dvojke.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 1.6Fiksevi dana
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499075
18:55 | Lacio - Seltik
Lacio je vodio u Glazgovu, ali je ostao praznih šaka i to je bila još jedna potvrda da mu gostovanja uopšte ne prijaju (2:1 za Kelte). Na Olimpiku je mahom nemilosrdan, a pošto Seltik takođe slovi za domaćinsku ekipu kec je ovde ipak najrealniji, iako su Zeleni u boljoj formi.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.65Fiksevi dana
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499079
21:00 | Vulverhempton - Slovan Bratislava
 
Slovan se dobro drži i nemamo nikakvu nameru da ga omalovažavamo, međutim posle serije teških utakmica, u kojima je beležio "šarene" rezultate Vulverhemptonu ovaj duel dođe skoro kao predah. Mada kec nema alternativu, kombinacija sa golovima na obe strane nije nezamisliva.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.35Fiksevi dana
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499087
21:00 | Menhengladbah - Roma
Obe ekipe odlično guraju u domaćim prvenstvima, naročito Menhengladbah koji je iznenađujući lider Bundeslige i izuzetno je zaguljen na Borusija-Parku. Međutim, Roma od marta nije izgubila u gostima, a pošto smo ubeđeni u to da će golova biti na obe strane GG je najbolja opcija.
 
Oba tima daju gol: ggKvota: 1.57Vredi probati
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499091
18:55 | Standard - Ajntraht Frankfurt
 
Lijež nije gostoljubiv. Pritom, Standard bi se pobedom poravnao sa Ajntrahtom i to je motiv koji će ga naterati na ofanzivu. Ali, demoliranje Bajerna odvelo je goste na "sedmo nebo" i kec je najmanje verovatan. Verujemo da će elan držati goste i večeras, pa probajte dvojku.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2Vredi probati
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4498929
21:00 | Mančester Junajted - Partizan
Partizan nije zaslužio da izgubi u Humskoj, a sada će mu biti još teže jer bi Junajted pobedom osigurao plasman u narednu fazu i trebalo bi očekivati još jači sastav od onog iz beogradskog duela. Ipak, Parni valjak bi mogao da zatrese mrežu slavnog rivala, a GG sjajno plaća.
Oba tima daju gol: ggKvota: 2.2Vredi probati
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499090
21:00 | Espanjol - Ludogorec
Smena trenera malo je prenula plavo-bele, iako se na njima i dalje primećuje manjak samopouzdanja (još su pri dnu tabele španske Primere). Ludogorec je sposoban da dobija ovakve mečeve, ali ako ga je Espanjol savladao u Bugarskoj, zašto ne bi i kod kuće (verovatno opet uz 0-2)?
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.9Za izbegavanje
ŠVEDSKA 2 PLAY OUT ID: 4500715
19:00 | Umea - Frej
Radi se o prvoj utakmici doigravanja za plasman u Drugu ligu Švedske, odnosno za opstanak u njoj. Umea je prvenstvo okončala na drugoj poziciji svoje grupe Divizije jedan, dok je protivnik jedva izbegao direktnu eliminaciju iz Superetana. Sve u svemu, najbolje je da ih obiđete.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2.05
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TIPPING (Thursday): Partizan can hit Old Traford, win "chops" for AZ Alkmaar and Wolverhampton
Read some suggestions for November 7th ...

07 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their views on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.

What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?


Leave your comment below ...

Fixes of the day
Europa League ID: 4499085
16:50 | Astana - AZ Alkmaar
The guest appearance at Nur-Sultan AZ comes at the perfect time as Astana has no chance of passing the group and focused on defending the title in Kazakhstan. It was the right move, however, her players were "blown out" and that makes the couple safe, and it is not excluded that she could come from the two.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 1.6Fixed Days
Europa League ID: 4499075
18:55 | Lazio - Celtic
Lazio led in Glasgow, but remained empty-handed and this was another confirmation that his away team did not like him at all (2: 1 for the Celts). He is mostly ruthless in the Olympics, and since Celtic is also known for the home team, the ace is still the most realistic here, although the Greens are in better shape.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.65Fixed Days
Europa League ID: 4499079
21:00 | Wolverhampton - Slovan Bratislava

Slovan is holding up well and we have no intention of belittling him, however, after a series of difficult matches in which he recorded colorful results for Wolverhampton, this duel came almost as a break. Although the ace has no alternative, the combination of goals on both sides is not unthinkable.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.35Fixed Days
Europa League ID: 4499087
21:00 | Mönchengladbach - Roma
Both teams are pushing well in the domestic championships, especially Mönchengladbach who is the surprising leader of the Bundesliga and is extremely stuck on Borussia Park. However, Roma has not lost away since March, and since we are convinced that goals will be on both sides of the GG is the best option.

Both teams score: ggQuota: 1.57Worth a try
Europa League ID: 4499091
18:55 | Standard - Eintracht Frankfurt

Lie is not hospitable. In doing so, Standard would equate to Eintracht with victory, and that is the motive that will make him go on the offensive. But the demolition of Bayern took guests to the "seventh heaven" and an ace is the least likely. We believe that elan will hold guests tonight, so try a couple.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2Worth a try
Europa League ID: 4498929
21:00 | Manchester United - Partizan
Partizan did not deserve to lose to Humska, and now it will be even more difficult as United would win the standings in the next phase with a win and should expect an even stronger lineup than the one from the Belgrade duel. Still, the Steam Roller could shake up a network of celebrity rivals, and GG pays great.
Both teams score: ggQuota: 2.2Worth a try
Europa League ID: 4499090
21:00 | Espanyol - Ludogorec
The change of coaches has shifted slightly to blue and white, although they still show a lack of confidence (they are still at the bottom of the Spanish Primer table). Ludogorets is capable of winning matches like this, but if Espanyol has beaten him in Bulgaria, why not go home (probably 0-2 again)?
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.9To avoid
SWEDEN 2 PLAY OUT ID: 4500715
19:00 | Umea - Frey
This is the first leg of the playoffs to qualify for the Swedish Second Division, or to survive in it. Umea finished the championship in the second position of her Division One group, while her opponent barely escaped direct elimination from the Superetan. All in all, it's best to go around them.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2.05
